availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Mary H. Arnold Cook. Father of A. B. Cook, C. D. Cook, J. M. Cook, and L. B. Cook.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, District 1, stamped p. 467. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, p. 95. Find A Grave, "Dewitt Clinton Cook (1828-1910)," Memorial #25984005, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=25984005&ref=acom (accessed June, 14, 2017).
